name: The Michael Scott "Scott's Tots" Bursary Fund
description:
Any student in Canada or the US who can tell us your favorite parts about the Office.

Why do you love it, what makes it so great, anything!
criteria_info: I just--I fell in love with these kids. And I didn't want to see them fall victim to the system. So I made 'em a promise. I told them if they graduated from high school, I would pay for their college education. I have made some empty promises in my life but, hands down that was the most generous

specific_questions.question: Why do you like the office so much?
Why do you deserve this scholarship?

name: Atila Drake "Superfan" Scholarship
description: Any high school, college or university student in Canada who can tell us your favourite Drake Song, lyric and why you think he is so popular.
criteria_info:
We were trying to think of a relatable topic that most Canadian students could write about as a way to announce our new direct applications scholarship feature and we decided on Drake, it's that simple.

 

To apply, tell us your favourite Drake Song, lyric and optional: why you think he is so popular or what does he mean to you? 

Then engage with at least one of our social media posts:

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/atilatech/status/1318162643354636294
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/p/CGhni2MlmlC/
  • Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6723930724132552704

 

We are in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Drake, we just really like his music.

specific_questions.question: What is your favorite Drake song?
What is your favorite Drake lyric?
Optional: Answer either one or both of these questions: Why do you think Drake is so popular or what does Drake mean to you?
Have you engaged with at least one of our social media posts? (see scholarship description for more details)

name: Atila Science and Engineering STEM Scholarship
description: Any high school, college or university student in Canada who is currently studying or planning to study in a science, engineering or any STEM related field.Simply tell us why you chose to enter the STEM field and send us a link to something cool you've done.
criteria_info:
We were thinking of a way to announce our new direct applications scholarship feature and we looked at the data on our site and realized that most of our users are interested in STEM-related field so we want to reward our largest user base and say thank you for supporting Atila.

We also believe that science and engineering plays a big role towards making a better society, so this award is to encourage and reward you for studying a field that has played a big role in the advancing of society.

To apply, tell us why you chose to study STEM and a link to something cool you've built.

Then make sure you engage with at least one of our social media posts:

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/atilatech/status/1318160622777925632
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/p/CGhnY0LFb74/
  • Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6723930109943828480
keywords: Engineering Health Sciences Biochemistry Biology Chemistry Mathematics Computer Science Nanotechnology

specific_questions.question: Why did you choose to study a STEM-related field?
How do you plan on using your science, engineering or STEM background to make the world a better place?
A link to something cool you've done: (it could be in the format of  video, github, blog post, website, picture anything)
